title: Revealing the role of redox reaction selectivity and mass transfer in current–voltage predictions for ensembles of photocatalysts
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02005G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Luisa Barrera, Bradley W. Layne, Zejie Chen, Kenta Watanabe, Akihiko Kudo, Daniel V. Esposito, Shane Ardo, Rohini Bala Chandran
A powerful detailed-balance model predicts optimal gains with many optically thin photo absorbers instead of one thick absorber. Selectivity and efficiency are controlled by redox species mass-transfer rates regardless of kinetic asymmetry.
